title: 884 102 "I Miss Him! Vivi and Rebecca's Sentiments!"Transliteration: "Aitai – Bibi to Rebekka no Omoi" (Japanese:会いたい ビビとレベッカの想い) Yutaka Nakashima Tomohiro Nakayama May 12, 2019(2019-05-12)
transformers_text:
884 102 "I Miss Him! Vivi and Rebecca's Sentiments!"Transliteration: "Aitai – Bibi to Rebekka no Omoi" (Japanese:会いたい ビビとレベッカの想い) Yutaka Nakashima Tomohiro Nakayama May 12, 2019(2019-05-12)

The Neptune Family and some other royals reach the top of the Red Line and entered Mariejois. They then arrive at Pangaea Castle and meet with all the participants of the Reverie. Shirahoshi meets Rebecca and Nefertari Vivi after overhearing them talking about Luffy.
